petitionerArgument.summaryOfViolation: Improper calculation of base rent and rent increases, failing to account for rent concessions

rationale.respondentHadNotice: Yes, via lease terms and rent payment history
rationale.evidenceAssessment: Rent ledger and payment records showed improper base rent calculations
rationale.impactAssessment: Tenant overcharged due to incorrect base rent calculation

petitionerArgument.summaryOfViolation: Multiple maintenance issues including mold, peeling paint, broken appliances, and damaged flooring in bathrooms, kitchen and living room

rationale.respondentHadNotice: Yes, via maintenance request on August 23, 2023
rationale.evidenceAssessment: Photos and video evidence supported claims of disrepair
rationale.impactAssessment: Issues affected habitability and proper use of multiple rooms
